page.title: 05RELIGION St.Margaret's
page.content: St.Margaret's Church has a Sunday Service every Sunday,50 attend the Service. They usually have communion on Sunday.There are 55 people on the church electoral roll. The church has a sunday school every sunday, and about 25 children attend the school. It is run by Mrs Spencer.People usually travel to church by car,but if they live in Bodelwyddan, they sometimes walk.The Marble Church as it is known has many Weddings, funerals, and christenings.The weddings are usually held on a Saturday.The vicar has weddings nearly every week. Funerals may be held throughout the week .They have quite a lot of funerals in Bodelwyddan church. People come from over seas to see the graves of the dead.There are 117 War Graves in the church yard,83 Canadian and 34 British.
